answers.answer: sounds like you have the beginning stages of peripheral neuropathy.  the nerves are damaged (caused by medication, diabetes, alcohol, or autoimmue disease) and become hypersensitive.  cymbalta, lyrica, and neurontin are some medications that can help.quinine found in tonic water can help too.patients may also find relief when taking vitamin b supplements (which help nourish nerves).

question: hii have painfull feet numbing of the pads under my toes,browning of my second to my forth toes very sencitive feet when i never used to infact i loved my feet tickled now just the slight touch of anthing is either to painfull or tickles the hell out of my feet just putting on a pair of socks sends my feet crazy just need anwsers before i go to my doc and get told to stop smoking and lose weight just knowing what it is and how to treat it if it can be treated at home would be good
title: painfull feet
